name: A Stay in the AfterCastle
description:
You play as Jack, a treasure hunter, who has heard of a haunted castle with lots of loot. Each night you will dive into the halls of the AfterCastle to brave the ghosts in search of loot

As all TerminalGoblin games the source is freely available here: https://github.com/Terminal-Goblin-Games/A_Stay_In_The_Aftercastle
